```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Borra todas las variables

rm(list = ls())
```


# Importamos datos con Rbase

```{r}
RutaFichero_rbase = "data/Baltimore_City_Employee_Salaries.csv"
datos_rbase <- read.csv(file = RutaFichero_rbase)
datos_rbase
```

# Importamos datos con Readr

```{r}
RutaFichero_readr = "data/Baltimore_City_Employee_Salaries.csv"
datos_readr <- read_csv(RutaFichero_readr, col_types = cols(hireDate = 
                                              col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
datos_readr
```

# Importamos datos con librería RIO

```{r}
RutaFichero_rio = "data/Baltimore_City_Employee_Salaries.csv"
datos_rio <- import(RutaFichero_rio)
datos_rio
```
